verbs.description: [V: living] [ARGM-MNR: quietly] [ARGM-LOC: inside the glare ruth madoff] [ARGM-LOC: the wife of the infamous financial culprit] is once again in the spotlight with the debut of a new hbo film about bernard madoff crimes people in her adopted hometown where financial scandals impacting families are hardly an unknown occurrence seem to be supportive in interviews with a dozen neighbors former neighbors residents and merchants in old greenwich this week there was little resentment expressed toward the wife of one of the most infamous financial criminals of all time residents said madoff keeps a low profile stopping in for a bagel on sound beach avenue most mornings then running errands at the cvs bernie madoff was arrested in 2008 and is serving a lifetime sentence in federal prison for defrauding some 64 8 billion from thousands of investors some of whom lost all their savings to his scheme in a statement ruth released during her husband legal proceedings she said she was unaware of his illicit dealings ruth madoff old greenwich connecticut greenwich bernard madoff
